LanguageData.PsychicRitualSiege.arrivalTextEnemy: They intend to perform {RITUAL_definite} ritual. Interrupt them before they can complete it. If they aren't stopped they may invoke the ritual multiple times.
LanguageData.ShamblerAssault.arrivalTextEnemy: Some unnatural force is animating these lifeless corpses. They are intent on attacking your colony. As they exhaust their strange energy, they will begin to collapse within hours.
